channel.title: Comments on: Kena: Bridge of Spirits Corrupt Taro Master Difficulty Fight.

item.title: By: Niijima-San
item.dc:creator: Niijima-San
item.description: i heard they patched the master difficulty trophy glitch, kind of bums me out bc i really do not like games that have difficulty based trophies, it is why i never plat'ed judgment
item.content:encoded: i heard they patched the master difficulty trophy glitch, kind of bums me out bc i really do not like games that have difficulty based trophies, it is why i never plat’ed judgment

item.title: By: normandus
item.dc:creator: normandus
item.description: I have had a lot of people play this game and one thing that they all agree on is that it is challenging. Kena's bridge, for instance, is the hardest stage in the game. The puzzles are difficult and there are no checkpoints which means you can't save your progress.
item.content:encoded: I have had a lot of people play this game and one thing that they all agree on is that it is challenging. Kena’s bridge, for instance, is the hardest stage in the game. The puzzles are difficult and there are no checkpoints which means you can’t save your progress.
